entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the morning and early afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
